sentences.sContent: Orchids and orchid bees are a classic example of this relationship.
sentences.sContent_eng: Orchids and orchid bees are a classic example of this relationship.
sentences.sCn: 兰花和兰蜂就是这种关系的典型例子。

synos.tran: [园艺]兰花；[植]兰科植物；淡紫色

trans.tranCn: [植] 兰, 兰花, 淡紫色
trans.tranOther: a plant that has flowers which are brightly coloured and usually shaped
